Key Match Events: LeBron James helped the Lakers notch a 107-102 win against the Bucks.
LeBron James finished with 11 points, six rebounds, and four assists.
LeBron James, along with other starters, sat out after the first half, while Bronny James entered during the second half.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James expressed some frustration about traveling to Milwaukee for the LA Lakers' third preseason game against the Bucks.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James shared how Bronny’s presence motivates him, stating, 'It's a pure joy to be able to come to work every day, put in the hard work, work with your son every day and be able to see him continue to grow.'
